akka.persistence.multidc.scaladsl

Interface ReplicatedEntity.CommandContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReplicatedEntity.ActorContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandContextImpl
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimulatedContext
    Enclosing class:
    ReplicatedEntity<Command,Event,State>

    public static interface ReplicatedEntity.CommandContext
extends ReplicatedEntity.ActorContext
    Actor context for ReplicatedEntity with somewhat limited capabilities and additional functionality specifically replicated entities.

    Replies are sent with the sender() ActorRef in the context or an ActorRef that is passed in the command.

    Not for user extension.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface akka.persistence.multidc.scaladsl.ReplicatedEntity.ActorContext

        actorOf, actorOf, actorSelection, actorSelection, child, children, dispatcher, parent, receiveTimeout, self, sender, setReceiveTimeout, stop, system, timers, unwatch, watch
